title: I think Amummu is in an ok spot.
body: Title.   Not to strong, not to weak.

replies.body: but hes still hard to play with tho. not because complicated kit, but because he requires competent teammates. seriously. just. one. person. please follow up.

> [{quoted}](name=Snapp2Kill,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9zeupHqG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-21T00:44:29.154+0000)
>
> but hes still hard to play with tho. not because complicated kit, but because he requires competent teammates. seriously. just. one. person. please follow up.

Hey, I play MuMu Jungle a lot... I'm currently around 60% with him of 80-90 matches.  I agree with what you said, my game play with him is pretty consistent and I find that he needs competent teammates as well.  Another champ I find to be similar in the sense they have great team fight but need the team is Morgana.
same with kennen and orianna. but unlike the other 2, orianna can be relatively far away and do junk.
Or just play him full AP like I did a couple seasons ago for an ez self-carry to gold :p
